quote: Success is a journey, not a destination.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: You are the average of the five people you spend the most time with.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Nothing will work unless you do.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: To learn and not to do is really not to learn. To know and not to do is really not to know.
author: Stephen R. Covey

quote: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: If you're afraid to fail, then you're probably going to fail.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: You can make more friends in two months by becoming interested in other people than you can in two years by trying to get other people interested in you.
author: Dale Carnegie
